overview:
Perminova develops and markets web-based software for the nationâ€™s leading cardiology centers. The company is pioneering healthcareâ€™s move from outdated client-server technology to modern, secure cloud computing. Perminova offers customers Software-as-a-Service (SaaS), allowing them to take full advantage of a surgical information system thatâ€™s more robust, flexible and cost-effective than currently available.

In 2011, the company released Perminova EP, a software module that manages the scheduling, workflow and billing that occur before, during and after cardiac electrophysiological (EP) procedures. Perminova EP enables doctors, nurses and administrators to realize enhanced charge-capture, efficiency and patient safety.
